caption.p: Pre-HAP (2007–2010) and Post-HAP (2014–2015) summer daily temperatures (dotted lines) and daily mortality incidence (solid lines). (a) Daily max temp and mortality 2007. (b) Daily max temp and mortality 2008. (c) Daily max temp and mortality 2009. (d) Daily max temp and mortality 2010. (e) Daily max temp and mortality 2014. (f) Daily max temp and mortality 2015.
